documents.document: Lionel Messi: “I want all of you to remember that the difficult and daunting things on the outside don’t have to be stronger than what you have on the inside. I want you to persevere. Because when you do, you remind me and others everywhere to do the same.” https://t.co/oSoyqrbJYZ
Jorge Messi: “Leo’s always had a way with children. I’d say he has a gift for understanding them. They’re dazzled by him, almost hypnotized.” #WorldChildrensDay

.@rioferdy5: “It's Messi time! I want to see him mesmerize the whole stadium, have us all like; How did he? Oh my God no! type performance.”

.@FCBarcelona:
Title: Hello Again Starring: Leo Messi Genre: Superhero Release: Nov. 15, 2017 Reviews: 🤝🤝🤝🤝🤝
https://t.co/fTMofAzLut

ESPN: “@Argentina losing 4-2 against @NGSuperEagles shows that ‘Messidependencia’ is very real. These are the stats since the 2018 @FIFAWorldCup qualifiers began. La Albiceleste are a completely different team without Lionel Messi.” https://t.co/2wrYmRrxyv
CNN: “Lionel Messi's new contract with @FCBarcelona is reportedly worth $644,000 per week.”
RT @MessiQuote: .@BleacherReport: "Even the signs know what they’re witnessing." https://t.co/DJLvD7ATzE
adidas: “Next stop, the 2018 @FIFAWorldCup.” https://t.co/tnNrVtyfQr
adidas: “An epic header, an historic victory. We know you don't need our help to guess this goal.” https://t.co/jsjhsHSETz

Júlio César: “For me, Neymar is the best player in the world today. Leo Messi? I said the world; Messi is from another planet! But I think this is Neymar's moment now. The whole world is following him and seeing how he does, even people who don't follow football are interested.” https://t.co/jktM1vZon8

Drogba: “Di Matteo put up a list of the opposing team's top scorers. Usually, the list would read something like;
22 goals — Rooney 15 goals — Van Persie
...and so on.
When the Barça list went up, sure enough, in third place was Xavi on 14, in equal second place were... (1/2)

RT @MessiQuote: .@JohanCruyff: “Messi is a lesson for the Netherlands — he plays to help his team, instead of causing problems for his team…
Leo Messi: “Having breakfast with them.” #ChildrensDay https://t.co/3pqpDaY1v5
RT @MessiQuote: .@MTV: “Shout out to Messi, one of the greatest footballers of our time!” #MTVEMA https://t.co/XTIJmjqWOP
RT @MessiQuote: .@hughwizzy [speaking in November 2017]: “Words fail me, they will not ever be enough to describe what has been an incredib…

Lorenzo Insigne: “I thank Goran for comparing me to Messi, but let's not exaggerate. It is better to avoid such comparisons. Messi is extraordinary, even if personally I still think the greatest player who ever lived was Diego Maradona.”
Goran Pandev: “Insigne is a great guy. In terms of his dribbling he reminds me of Messi, who is the best in the world. He has the chance to emulate the career of the @FCBarcelona phenomenon.”
Lorenzo Insigne: “I would have liked to play with champions like Lionel Messi and @LuisSuarez9, but now I’m thinking of @sscnapoli where I hope to win something important.”

.@hughwizzy [speaking in November 2017]: “Words fail me, they will not ever be enough to describe what has been an incredible career already. He could stop now and it would still be probably the greatest of all time.” https://t.co/nEuBU9fXgZ
.@MTV: “Shout out to Messi, one of the greatest footballers of our time!” #MTVEMA https://t.co/XTIJmjqWOP

Batistuta [on Messi breaking his record]: “It was a distinction which I had, it was a big deal. When I broke the record, the news went around the world. I was the top goalscorer for Argentina. Messi will end up scoring double my tally but at least I'm behind an extraterrestrial.” https://t.co/1oxp64JSey

@goal 2 years ago, by Messi.

.@petermstaunton: “Messi changed his game, @Cristiano doesn't have the patience or intelligence to do what Messi is doing.” https://t.co/VMs1O8Cv4t
.@petermstaunton: “Look how Messi has evolved. He drops deep. He makes the play. He nominally occupies the right side of attack but the entire field is his domain.”
RT @MessiQuote: .@petermstaunton: “Lionel Messi is currently playing better football than any other player, ever.”

We've just hit 70,000 followers.
The @MessiQuote family continues to grow each day.
We enjoy giving you an insight into what is being said about the greatest player to ever play the game, from people all over the world.
Thank you for sharing our tweets.
We are all Team Messi! https://t.co/wS30OKQ9Gs

.@RayHudson [on Leo's 61st goal for Argentina - his 44th career hat-trick]: “Genius. This is nothing less than witchcraft football from the sorcerer of football. The defence are left chasing him like Tom chasing Jerry, and they ain't ever gonna catch him.” https://t.co/xur87ouClL

Lionel Messi [when asked if he dared to walk to Luján or San Nicolás if he wins the @FIFAWorldCup]: “Let's go to San Nicolás. If we have to go, let's go.”
*The distance between his house in Arroyo Seco, Santa Fe to San Nicolás de los Arroyos is approximately an eight hour walk. https://t.co/VqxjloF4cL
